Sentencas: A 1 kW solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) balance of power (BOP) system is analyzed using experiments and simulations to optimize the design and operating conditions.
Titulo: Experimental and simulated investigation of 1 kW solid oxide fuel cell balance of power system

Sentencas: The system consists of an autothermal reformer, combined heat exchanger and afterburner, and dummy stack.
Titulo: Experimental and simulated investigation of 1 kW solid oxide fuel cell balance of power system

Sentencas: Thermolib program is used for the simulations.
Titulo: Experimental and simulated investigation of 1 kW solid oxide fuel cell balance of power system

Sentencas: The system exhibits stable operation during a two cycle on/off experiment.
Titulo: Experimental and simulated investigation of 1 kW solid oxide fuel cell balance of power system

Sentencas: The simulated results obtained by zero-dimensional modeling are similar to the experimental results although a discrepancy appears early in operation owing to the simplified modeling.
Titulo: Experimental and simulated investigation of 1 kW solid oxide fuel cell balance of power system

Sentencas: The system's characteristics are also investigated in terms of the fuel utilization, presence or absence of internal reforming and external heat transfer coefficient.
Titulo: Experimental and simulated investigation of 1 kW solid oxide fuel cell balance of power system
